mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER.T_PATIENT (PATIENT_ID, PATIENT_NAME, BIRTHDAY, GENDER, PATIENT_GUARDIAN, MOBILEPHONE, TELEPHONE, EMAIL, QQ, WECHAT, RESIDENCE_PLACE, ALLERGIC_DRUGS, ALLERGENIC_FOODS, OTHER_ALLERGENS, HAS_HEART_DISEASE, HEART_DISEASE_REMARK, BLOOD_PRESSURE_STATUS, CURRENT_BLOOD_PRESSURE, BLOOD_GLUCOSE_STATUS, CURRENT_BLOOD_GLUCOSE, HAS_OTHER_DISEASE, OTHER_DISEASE_REMARK, HAS_SMOKING_HISTORY, HAS_DRINKING_HISTORY, ANAESTHESIA_ADVERSE_REACTIONS, IS_PREGNANT, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, CREATE_USER, UPDATE_USER, EXTENSION) VALUES (#{id}, #{name}, #{birthday}, #{gender}, #{guardian}, #{mobilephone}, #{telephone}, #{email}, #{qq}, #{wechat}, #{residencePlace}, #{allergicDrugs}, #{allergenicFoods}, #{otherAllergens}, #{hasHeartDisease}, #{heartDiseaseRemark}, #{bloodPressureStatus}, #{currentBloodPressure}, #{bloodGlucoseStatus}, #{currentBloodGlucose}, #{hasOtherDisease}, #{otherDiseaseRemark}, #{hasSmokingHistory}, #{hasDrinkingHistory}, #{anaesthesiaAdverseReactions}, #{isPregnant}, now(), now(), #{createUser}, #{updateUser}, #{extension});
mapper.update: UPDATE member . t_patient SET PATIENT_NAME = #{name}, BIRTHDAY = #{birthday}, GENDER = #{gender}, PATIENT_GUARDIAN = #{guardian}, MOBILEPHONE = #{mobilephone}, TELEPHONE = #{telephone}, EMAIL = #{email}, QQ = #{qq}, WECHAT = #{wechat}, RESIDENCE_PLACE = #{residencePlace}, ALLERGIC_DRUGS = #{allergicDrugs}, ALLERGENIC_FOODS = #{allergenicFoods}, OTHER_ALLERGENS = #{otherAllergens}, HAS_HEART_DISEASE = #{hasHeartDisease}, HEART_DISEASE_REMARK = #{heartDiseaseRemark}, BLOOD_PRESSURE_STATUS = #{bloodPressureStatus}, CURRENT_BLOOD_PRESSURE = #{currentBloodPressure}, BLOOD_GLUCOSE_STATUS = #{bloodGlucoseStatus}, CURRENT_BLOOD_GLUCOSE = #{currentBloodGlucose}, HAS_OTHER_DISEASE = #{hasOtherDisease}, OTHER_DISEASE_REMARK = #{otherDiseaseRemark}, HAS_SMOKING_HISTORY = #{hasSmokingHistory}, HAS_DRINKING_HISTORY = #{hasDrinkingHistory}, ANAESTHESIA_ADVERSE_REACTIONS = #{anaesthesiaAdverseReactions}, IS_PREGNANT = #{isPregnant}, UPDATE_TIME = now(), UPDATE_USER = #{updateUser}, EXTENSION = #{extension} WHERE PATIENT_ID = #{id};
